name: Go Go Ackman 2
overview: The second installment in the Go Go Ackman series, concerning a young demon and his cherubic nemesis who tries to rein in the destruction he causes. Ackman is now pitted against the Metal Angels, a rock band of Angels inspired by the voice of God, Metatron.Ackman is capable of a wide variety of actions, which often vary depending on the weapon being wielded at the time.Go Ackman 2 is an Action game, developed by Aspect and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1995.
